SEARCH
Module eat.neilson.cafe
Package eat.neilson.Cafe

Class DonutViewController

java.lang.Object
eat.neilson.Cafe.DonutViewController
public class DonutViewController extends Object
This class serves as the main controller for the donut ordering window. Orders from this window are sent back to the main cart.
Author:
Adeola Asimolowo

    • updateSubtotal

      private void updateSubtotal(String operation, Donut donut)
      Updates the running subtotal. Adds to subtotal if we are adding to preOrder Listview . Subtracts if we are removing a donut from the preOrder Listview.
      Parameters:
      operation - add or subtract from current subtotal
      donut - pass the donut currently being selected.

    • setMainController
